meanings.definition: A small bag used to carry money and personal items.

meanings.sent2: I need to buy a new purse for my sister.
meanings.sent3: The purse matched her shoes perfectly.
meanings.sent4: Her purse was a treasure trove of memories.
meanings.sent5: The purse jingled with loose change.
